title: LF a Diamond mid laner for Ranked 5s, hopefully pushing for High Diamond
body: LF a Diamond+ mid laner to push for Diamond/Master or even Challenger...Preferable if you know how 2 play some control mages :) We are currently Gold V but we are 13 wins 5 losses but can easily champ with a winning streak. We all use curse voice and are super relaxed so theres zero rage. Add me if interested :DisturbedNero ,or comment...We only have 17 days to push lets do this XD

replies.body:
Hi there DisturbedNero! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at www.qtesports.com ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
